tweets.text:
Attention anglers, the new #FishingLicence images have launched! 

Which is your favourite?

Buy yours today at: https://t.co/fx56eQ45pG https://t.co/yKj4ytywOH

@EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 @AaronBell4NUL @SimonTagg @NewsNBC 4. What have you done to show the thousands of residents that you recognise our difficulty and that you are taking our concerns seriously? Monitor the situation for another three months? Oops, the monitor wasn‚Äôt even plugged in!

@EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 @AaronBell4NUL @SimonTagg @NewsNBC 3. I, for one, am much more concerned about whatever toxic gas is entering our lungs with the smell ‚Äì what can cause thousands of people to have headaches (no painkillers can shift), vomit, feel nausea, have watery, streaming eyes, itching, irritated mouth, throat and chest,

@EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 @AaronBell4NUL @SimonTagg @NewsNBC 2. ‚Äòodour‚Äô minimises what we are experiencing. I want you and the world to know this is not a bit of a smell‚Äì think dirty nappies and unemptied bins x a hundred. Imagine every breath is like smelling it for the first time and you have to suffer this for hours, days, weeks, months

@EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 @AaronBell4NUL @SimonTagg @NewsNBC I would say you don't care and that you are actually aiding Red Industries in their destruction of environment and our lives.

Also,

Field teams out today this was a very large tree that has been  cleared from #Cleeve weir - stopping it from being shut in,All cleared and operating correctly .‚Å¶@EnvAgencySE‚Å© ‚Å¶@MarkHill03‚Å© ‚Å¶@wifo_ea‚Å© ‚Å¶@Jennifer_Hil1‚Å© https://t.co/5M8uhrmq1k
@annjsmall @EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 @AaronBell4NUL @SimonTagg @NewsNBC Yeah, not fit for purpose..incompetent at best.
@EnvAgency fancy monitoring toxic fumes in Newcastle all weekend and you didn‚Äôt have a shilling for the meter üôÑüôÑüôÑ#epicfail #stopthestink  . Hand your heads in shame
Just five weeks today will be my first day with @EnvAgency - can't wait to get going and help shape the future of hydrology. https://t.co/FAaG6XMxZ0

tweets.text: @EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 @AaronBell4NUL @SimonTagg @NewsNBC Appalling that the EA install a monitoring van, that isn‚Äôt monitoring as it has no power. Surely someone checked what power was available beforehand!! üò° Seriously @EnvAgencyMids, confidence has been completely lost in this agency!!

@EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 @AaronBell4NUL @SimonTagg @NewsNBC Not just the Silverdale area though unfortunately, there were people 6 miles away this weekend that smelt it. That‚Äôs no exaggeration unfortunately, why wasn‚Äôt the equipment working?? üò≠üò≠üò≠üò≠

@EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 @AaronBell4NUL @SimonTagg @NewsNBC But not enough sympathy to actually offer an apology for your  ineptitude over lack of inspection visits over the complaints at the weekend or your inability to provide power to a monitoring unit which has been installed for over a week but you didn't che k it was operating.

@Lisahannon15 @EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 @AaronBell4NUL @SimonTagg @NewsNBC Someone needed come out at the weekend! That's a fact is it actually going take a death or few before you do something! This so serious something needs be done.

A small cleanup action at #RushgrovePark yesterday, where we removed an abandoned @asda trolley, a car tyre, traffic cones, clothes, cans, plastic and wire fence from the riverbank. A lot more to do! Who likes to help keep the #Silkstream clean?@EnvAgencySE #colindale #barnet https://t.co/elN5fTt38O

Caught on üé•

Our field teams & contractors have been in #Wigan investigating reports of a blockage at Poolstock Brook.

Using CCTV, the teams confirmed that the blockage has washed through, meaning this culvert is once again ready to respond.

Good work guys!

#PrepareActSurvive https://t.co/TZqsFwwHV4

@EnvAgency This is a dangerous line to tread... we‚Äôve seen that here in #NorthFerriby where the developer is boasting that the site will have 40% open space. It already exists. It is the Wolds Way & the meadow next to it is the village‚Äôs buffer. Only 60 steps from a home to the warehouse

tweets.text: @EnvAgencyNW Who is responsible for clearing the culvert under the road outside our house @prestoncouncil don‚Äôt seem too interested? Flood water comes up our drive.

We've added woody material to a stretch of the Cray, a precious chalk stream in #Bexley -  as part of  our work restoring an 800m stretch to boost the rivers' health, in p/ship with @EnovertCT, @LBofBexley & @EnvAgency. Read more: https://t.co/WRUFxrKXsn https://t.co/VLAIFpR4nc

@socrates2sox @EnvAgency @ForestryEngland @GeorgeMonbiot Dammit all. Are you suggesting an animal that might do this kind of work for nothing? Be very careful with that kind of thinking who knows where it would end and how popular it would be?

@pinkcastleprin1 @ClarkEv27594302 @EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 @AaronBell4NUL @SimonTagg @NewsNBC The escalation over the last 12 months has been significant.
At least if more awareness is drawn to the issue to those further away more will realise what it is they have been smelling..

Great to be out today in #Preston to see the important üå≥ maintenance work being done as prep for the new #flood defences. @EnvAgencyNW @prestoncouncil @VolkerStevinUK @LancashireCC @esif1420england https://t.co/8gk1FEN2uX

@88si888 @ClarkEv27594302 @EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 @AaronBell4NUL @SimonTagg @NewsNBC There have been reports as far as Alsager. A family member lives there and people have been talking about the smell on local pages. They didn‚Äôt put it together with this landfill, in fact many of them didn‚Äôt know it existed, lucky them. üò≠

@ClarkEv27594302 @EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 @AaronBell4NUL @SimonTagg @NewsNBC I would also add, in my opinion, any Councillor/party supporting @RedIndustries2 at this stage would be akin to a turkey voting for Christmas in terms of the local elections next year. üòú

tweets.text:
Construction work will begin later this year. 

The work will better protect homes from flooding in the Marygate, Earlsborough Terrace and Esplanade Court area. https://t.co/AJBhKeJb9j

The work is being done now to avoid bird nesting season.

We will be planting five trees to every tree felled. https://t.co/BFbQGkisCF

This week we start preliminary work on flood defence improvements in Museum Gardens, York. 

As part of this it‚Äôs necessary to remove 14 trees. This does not include the rare ‚ÄòTrue Service Tree‚Äô. https://t.co/6hAbxAChkc
